      • post

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response post(es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.Note newNote,
                                                                                 @Context
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method, it's called when the logged user want to created a new Note, where he is the owner. The ownerID must be the idu of the logged user All the fields must be not empty, and type only can be 0 or 1 IDN can have any value, because this value will be changed by the DAO
        Parameters:
        newNote - Note instance created with the JSON information

      • put

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{idn: [0-9]+}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response put(es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.Note noteUpdate,
                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="idn")
                                                                                                              long idn,
                                                                                                              @Context
                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method, it's called when the logged user want to update a note The ownerID must be the idu of the logged user All the fields must be not empty, and type only can be 0 or 1 IDN of JSON and parameter must be the same value
        Parameters:
        noteUpdate - Note instance created with the JSON information
        idn - id of the note to update. It must exist!
        request -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
